text: Pascal Smet (born July 7, 1967 in Beveren) is a Belgian politician. He is a member of sp.a. Smet studied law at the University of Antwerp. He was a minister of the Brussels-Capital Region and of Flanders. He has also been an alderman of the city of Brussels since 2006. Smet is openly gay. == References == * Pascal Smet's Website Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian LGBT people Category:Flemish politicians Category:Gay men Category:LGBT politicians Category:Politicians from Brussels Category:People from East Flanders Category:Socialistische Partij Anders politicians
title: Pascal Smet
